description.value:
An eidolon learns to cast a basic spell as an innate spellcasting ability. Select one spell from the list below. This spell can be cast once per day as an action.

At 4th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The save DC for this spell is 10 + the Eidolonâ€™s Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 10 to take this evolution.

This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell.
